title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007 (Additional Certificates for Renewable Transport Fuel) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of April
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (additional certificate renewable transport fuel) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 1st day april

title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: 2. The Agency may, in accordance with section 44G of the National Oil
text_raw:
2. The Agency may, in accordance with section 44G of the National Oil 
Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by 
the account holder in accordance with that section – 

(a) 

the additional certificates specified in Regulation 3 in respect of 
renewable transport fuel listed in Annex IX of the Directive or 
in relation to which the Agency has determined, in accordance 
with section 44G, as eligible renewable transport fuel, and 

(b) 

the additional certificates specified in Regulation 4 in respect of 
renewable transport fuel not referred to in paragraph (a).
text_norm: 2 agency may accordance section 44g national oil reserve agency act 2007 issue account holder application account holder accordance section - (a) additional certificate specified regulation 3 respect renewable transport fuel listed annex ix directive relation agency determined accordance section 44g eligible renewable transport fuel (b) additional certificate specified regulation 4 respect renewable transport fuel referred paragraph (a)

title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: 3. The following are the additional certificates referred to in Regulation
text_raw:
3. The following are the additional certificates referred to in Regulation 

2(a): 

(a) 

(b) 

1 additional certificate and a partial additional certificate equal 
to 40% of a certificate in respect of each megajoule of 
biomethane or biogas disposed of by the account holder, by sale 
or otherwise, in the road or rail sectors, or in non-road mobile 
machinery, in the State during the reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 50% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of hydrotreated vegetable oil or coprocessed hydrotreated vegetable oil disposed of by the account 
holder, by sale or otherwise, in the road or rail sectors, or in 
non-road mobile machinery, in the State during the reporting 
period concerned; 

(c) 

a partial additional certificate equal to 50% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of renewable transport fuel known as 
category 1 animal by-product material (tallow) biodiesel – fatty 
acid methyl ester disposed of by the account holder, by sale or 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [143] 3 

otherwise, in the road or rail sectors, or in non-road mobile 
machinery, in the State during the reporting period concerned; 

(d) 

(e) 

a partial additional certificate equal to 40% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of renewable transport fuel disposed 
of by the account holder, by sale or otherwise, in the aviation 
sector in the State during the reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 40% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of renewable transport fuel disposed 
of by the account holder, by sale or otherwise, in the maritime 
sector in the State during the reporting period concerned.

title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: 4. The following are the additional certificates referred to in Regulation
text_raw:
4. The following are the additional certificates referred to in Regulation 

2(b): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

3 certificates in respect of each megajoule of renewable liquid 
and gaseous transport fuels of non-biological origin disposed of 
by the account holder, by sale or otherwise, in the road or rail 
sectors, or in non-road mobile machinery, in the State during the 
reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 70% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of biomethane or biogas disposed of 
by the account holder, by sale or otherwise, in the road or rail 
sectors, or in non-road mobile machinery, in the State during the 
reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 25% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of hydrotreated vegetable oil or coprocessed hydrotreated vegetable oil disposed of by the account 
holder, by sale or otherwise, in the road or rail sectors, or in 
non-road mobile machinery, in the State during the reporting 
period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 25% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of renewable transport fuel known as 
category 1 animal by-product material (tallow) biodiesel – fatty 
acid methyl ester disposed of by the account holder, by sale or 
otherwise, in the road or rail sectors, or in non-road mobile 
machinery, in the State during the reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 20% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule of renewable transport fuel disposed 
of by the account holder, by sale or otherwise, in the aviation 
sector in the State during the reporting period concerned; 

a partial additional certificate equal to 20% of a certificate in 
respect of each megajoule disposed of by the account holder, by 
sale or otherwise, in the maritime sector in the State during the 
reporting period concerned. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [143]

title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: In these regulations “account holder” means a renewable transport fuel
text_raw:
5. 

In these regulations “account holder” means a renewable transport fuel 

obligation account holder. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [143] 5
text_norm: 5 regulation account holder mean renewable transport fuel obligation account holder given official seal 31 march 2023 eamon ryan minister transport 143 5

title: Reserves Agency Act 2007, issue to an account holder on application to it by
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations authorise the National Oil Reserves Agency to issue 
additional renewable transport fuel obligation certificates to renewable 
transport fuel obligation account holders for the supply of specified renewable 
transport fuels, where those fuels are used for specific purposes or means of 
transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [143]
